node.title: So you want to be a backyard beekeeper. You, and many others
node.alt: man in bee suit standing holding bee frame with other people in bee suits in the background
node.description: Australians are swarming to amateur beekeeping, with the latest figures showing the sector valued at $173.5 million per year. But there's more to the hobby than simply buying bees.
node.content:
["For this group of students, it has\u00a0been a dream to keep bees.", "They're taking part in a beekeeping course run by one of Tasmania's most experienced commercial beekeepers.", "Some, like Ellie Langdon, are keen to take it up as a hobby, others are looking for a new business.", "\"There's a lot to it, more than I thought, but I've found it really interesting finding out the intricate details about their life and how they work,\"\u00a0Ms Langdon said.\u00a0", "\"I'm glad I've done the course before leaping into my active hive.\"", "Beekeeping has surged in popularity in the past five years.", "", "
New beekeeper Ellie Langdon\u00a0is waiting for her first population of bees to arrive.
", "In that time, numbers of recreational beekeepers have tipped over 28,000 nationally, up from 23,000.", "Trevor Weatherhead, chair of the Australian Honey Bee Industry Council, attributes the upsurge in recreational beekeeping to media highlighting concerns about declining bee populations and\u00a0the popularity of the hobbyist's Flow Hive.", "Mr Weatherhead said COVID lockdowns had also prompted\u00a0a spike in beekeeping.", "\"Ironically, I think COVID has played a little bit of a role in this. I've seen a few stories out there where people have got into bees in their backyard because of COVID they couldn't go anywhere,\"\u00a0Mr Weatherhead said.", "", "
Trevor Weatherhead is chair of the Australian Honey Bee Industry Council.(ABC News: Ashleigh Stevenson)
", "
Bees mean big bucks
", "The backyard industry has become a valuable sector in Australia.", "The AgriFutures Australia snapshot of the country's\u00a0honey bee industry likens recreational beekeeping to recreational fishing:\u00a0comparable in size to the commercial arm of the industry and just as important economically.", "The report\u00a0authors estimate the economic value of recreational beekeeping at\u00a0$173.5 million per year. In comparison,\u00a0the commercial honey bee and pollination sector is worth $264 million.", "Agrifutures, the government's\u00a0research and development arm,\u00a0estimates that recreational beekeepers spend $72 million per year on bee equipment including hives, bee suits, smokers and beekeeping courses.", "Southern Tasmanian commercial beekeeper Peter Norris has been in the business for years.", "He has\u00a0been running classes as well as\u00a0selling\u00a0bee equipment. He said the past couple of years had\u00a0seen an increase in their popularity.", "", "
Peter Norris has seen an increase in the number of amateurs interested in his course.(ABC News: Mitch Woolnough)
", "\"People are becoming more aware of how important bees are,\" Mr Norris said.", "\"It increases the appreciation of how much is involved and the necessity of bees and hopefully it will help educate people about being more careful with sprays and things like that.\"", "Mr Norris said he had run three\u00a0courses so far this season, an indicator of the growing interest in the\u00a0backyard hobby.", "
Women swarm\u00a0to beekeeping
", "A growing number of women are among\u00a0Australia's surging beekeeping hobbyists.", "Anita Long and Jenni\u00a0MacLeod run beekeeping education programs and a group called Sister Hives.", "\"Sister Hives started as an idea around Anita's kitchen table,\" Ms MacLeod said.", "\"We talked about how great it would be to run a program specifically for women.\"", "", "
Beekeeper\u00a0Jenni MacLeod is working to attract more women to the local industry.(Supplied: Jenni McLeod)
", "A\u00a0weekend pilot of the female-only program sold out in 48 hours.", "\"It\u00a0demonstrated to us that there was a need for connection, community\u00a0and skills-building; particularly among\u00a0women who want to do beekeeping,\"\u00a0Ms MacLeod said.", "Spring boarding off the success of the trial, the pair went on to\u00a0secure\u00a0funding from the Tasmanian government to run\u00a0a 12-month program for aspiring women beekeepers.", "\"We were overwhelmed with inquiries,\" Ms MacLeod said.", "\"We were funded initially for 25 places but we received over 120 inquiries from across the state.", "\"We ended up receiving 60 applications and we then went back to our funding body to make sure that everybody could be included in the program, because the key point about this program is connection, the skills.\"", "
Keeping track of backyard beekeepers
", "Across Australia there are\u00a0a multitude of classes for amateur beekeepers, a multitude of groups they can join, and plenty of equipment they can buy to support their hobby.", "", "
Smokers are used to calm the bees while being handled.(ABC Rural: Fiona Breen)
", "", "
Anita Long is taking beekeeping to more women.(ABC Rural: Fiona Breen)
", "It is\u00a0particularly important at a time when the industry is keen to protect our island nation's bee population from some of the devastating diseases that have wreaked havoc overseas.", "Industry bodies are encouraging hobby beekeepers\u00a0to register with their state's Primary Industries Department, but it is\u00a0not yet compulsory everywhere.", "Tasmania is the only state or\u00a0territory that does not\u00a0have mandatory hive registration, although there is hope\u00a0to have it\u00a0in place by April 2022.", "Mr Weatherhead said it was vitally important for backyard beekeepers to register their\u00a0hives.", "\"It's important that you do register because it's a biosecurity matter,\" he said.", "\"If ever we did get an incursion of a pest that is not in Australia we need to know where those beehives are, then we can go out and check them.\"", "But without penalties it could be considered\u00a0soft regulation and the\u00a0Australian Honey Bee Industry Council admits it is almost impossible to enforce.", "
Keeping disease at bay
", "", "
The interest in backyard beekeeping in Australia has increased over the past five years.(ABC Rural: Megan Hughes)
", "Taking a beekeeping course is the first step towards being able to recognise when a hive becomes unhealthy.", "\"We encourage beekeepers to join up with the local bee club so that way \u2026\u00a0they then realise what their responsibilities are,\"\u00a0Mr Weatherhead said.", "\"You've got to know how to look after your beehive. They're not something you put there and leave and don't look at. You need to look at bees to make sure they're all right.", "\"You need to check on them at least every two weeks to ensure they're getting enough food, they've got water supplies, the hive is\u00a0not too crowded and there's no disease.\""]
